aboutUs.title: About Avonniv
aboutUs.description: Why should it be complicated and time-consuming to find public funding for innovative ventures? It shouldnâ€™t! Avonniv is a non-profit forum that makes it easy for entrepreneurs and startups to discover opportunities of public funding for driving innovation. Access to funding is a crucial part of innovation; public grants should therefore be made visible and accessible to innovators, entrepreneurs and startups - this is what Avonniv does!
